OpenBMC.description: An indication of whether the system is prepared for the assembly to be removed.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ReadyToRemove.description: An indication of whether the system is prepared for an assembly to be removed.
ReadyToRemove.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether the system is ready for the assembly to be changed.  Setting the value to `true` shall cause the service to perform appropriate actions to allow the assembly to be removed.  Setting the value to `false` shall cause the service to perform appropriate actions to allow the assembly to be installed.

title: #OemAssembly.v1_0_0
